class_notes: Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from May 17 - June 30, 2024. Apply online at www.studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: Intermediate-level conversation and writing focused on first-hand encounters with Hispanic cultures for students participating in study abroad programs.
